name: hadith-shorts-ai
description: AI-powered YouTube Shorts generator for authentic Hadiths

scripts.start: echo 'Open index.html in your browser' && exit 0
scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const f='services/geminiService.ts'; const content=fs.readFileSync(f, 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync(f, content.replace(/process\.env\.API_KEY/g, '\"' + (process.env.API_KEY || '') + '\"'));"
